website_summaries.verdict: This affordable option is energy-efficient and surface-mounted, although care should be taken with the thin wiring during installation.
pros: Four pieces in six-inch strips, with each strip containing 12 LEDs
Epoxy-sealed to resist water, corrosion, and vibration
Surface-mount design at a good price
Has a nice look when installed
cons: The wiring is very thin and breaks easily
Some feel these lights could be brighter

customer_reviews.title: Thought I loved them but they suck
customer_reviews.text: Well.... had to replace these lights today. Barely lasted a year. Many of the LED didn’t work. Screws provided rusted. Plastic housing cracked. Would definitely buy again. Wires are thin but I doubled them n secured them. I mounted them 12 inches above deck to light up the cockpit., picture shows 2 on front of console and 1 on each side of console
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far these lights are perfect. I used these to replace led strip lights that are complete garbage. I have read some reviews about these particular lights cracking and going out. I will update this review if I have any future problems. However, they seem to be good quality and are very bright. I also read on here that these were not very bright, I have to disagree.
customer_reviews.author: HulkHuggett

customer_reviews.title: Not as brite as I thought they would be
customer_reviews.text: they come with a hole screw on each end to screw mount them. there is also a rubber back that is kind of cheesy but seems to work O.K. used in my rod box on my boat & under dash on port & starboard side. not real brite but enough to get by.
customer_reviews.author: Rick56

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with these for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are some really nice LEDs that cast light well but not so much as to be blinding if you mount them in the right location. They made perfect courtesy lighting for my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice light but the wiring is so thin that they broke off before we even got yo use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: timely delivery. installed on my boat in less then two hours
customer_reviews.author: albert henning

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, used as accent lighting in transom and on t -top
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: They work great and bright, put in boat all around and lights up great. Wish the pig tail was a little longer though, but will work.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: 1 fail upon testing
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box 1 light did not work when tested with 12 volts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Installed these on a 21 ft Triumph. They look ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on a 21 ft Triumph. They look incredible!! Seller provided item on time. At night they look incredible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenouria

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: They all worked. Bright what I was looking for only bummer is one burned out not sure why but the others are working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rosales

customer_reviews.title: ... wires coming out are too thin and break too easily when spliced
customer_reviews.text: Works but the wires coming out are too thin and break too easily when spliced.
customer_reviews.author: G3 TACO

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They look great on the I side of my boat.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wire more then 2 of these inline. Huge pain. Maybe that is publicized somewhere but gosh what a nightmare. Also wouldn’t sure in line with other lights. 12v DC marine
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: When you order you should send a main requesting mental screws if you plan to Mount to metal
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Only disappointed that it didn’t have screws for sheet metal. Only screws for wood
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Fast service. Nice indirect lighting for boat cockpit
customer_reviews.author: Joel Byer

customer_reviews.title: good lights. Wish the leaders were a little longer
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, good lights. Wish the leaders were a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Noel France

product_meta.title: 6" Clear/Blue Underwater Led RV Boat Light 12LED Utility Strip Light Sealed 4pcs, Universal 6 Inch Boat Marine Trailer Thin Clear Lens Blue Led Side Marker and Clearance Lights Strip Bar
feature_bullets: ( 4 ) 6" Slim Line LED Utility Strip Lights 12 diodes Clear/Blue.
Voltage: 12V Low Current Draw. Led Qty: 12LED
Circuit board completely sealed in epoxy to resist water, corrosion and vibration.
Great for lighting or decorating interior and exterior of boats, RVs and other vehicles.
Surface Mount Design ,Great for Lighting / Decoration / Functional etc. Universal For 12V Vehicles esp. the Boats, Interior & Exterior.

specifications.Model: 6" Inch Underwater Led Light Strips bar 12 Diodes, Clear/Blue
specifications.Special Features: Ideal for wet locations where additional lighting is needed, such as docks, boats, utility vehicles, etc, Rubber bottom gasket permits a tight fitting installation, A high quality and strudy LED fixture for boats, utility vehicles, RV's or anywhere you need lighting
